BREAST-COMPOSITION: This mammogram image shows a heterogeneously dense breast composition (ACR C), indicating a significant amount of glandular tissue with some fatty areas.
BIRADS: BI-RADS 3, this is a benign lesion requiring short-term follow-up to confirm stability
FINDINGS: There are no visible calcifications (CALC), well-defined masses (CIRC), spiculated masses (SPIC), or other ill-defined masses (MISC) in this image. However, there is a slight asymmetry between the right and left breasts, which may be due to normal variations or prior surgery. Further imaging with mammography or ultrasound and/or biopsy may be needed for confirmation.
